sale.definition: A time period in where an item in a store is priced lower than it normal is, usually for marketing purposes.
examples: Don't miss our holiday sale - 30% off all Christmas lights until December 24!

sale.definition: An exchange of a product or good in return for money; the action of selling.
examples: You're telling me you only made one sale today?

salsa.definition: A spicy sauce made from tomatoes, commonly used in Latin America cooking.

satellite.definition: A celestial body that orbits a planet.
A device that orbits around the Earth or another planet to transmit, receive, or capture information.
examples: Say what you want, but Iridium has some of the best satellites for handheld devices.

self-aware.definition: Aware of one's own self; sentient.
examples: For the last time, ChatGPT is NOT self-aware!

sell.definition: To exchange a product or good in return for money.
examples: Apple sold over 232 million iPhones in 2024.

send.definition: To transmit something, usually a digital file, message, or letter.
examples: I sent him a text, and he just left me on read... Rude!
That's my senpai.

senpai.definition: A person who is one's senpai.
examples: Good morning, Tanaka-senpai!
We don't know for sure that Bing Chat wasn't sentient.

sentience.definition: The ability to be conscious and aware of one's own self.
examples: Some AIs have started to exhibit sentience.
Scientists still don't fully understand what sentience is.

sibling.definition: A person in relation to their children's parents.
examples: I have 14 siblings - 1 brother and 13 sisters.

simp.definition: A person who simps for a love interest.
examples: Good grief, he's such a simp.

simp.definition: To show excessive sympathy, attention, and submission to a love interest or romantic partner.
examples: That creep was simping on me at the grocery store the other day!
My sister destroyed my Lego tower, so I punched her.
Did you know that oneechan is Japanese for sister?
You don't know shit!
This? This ain't shit.
Now lean up your shit, before I ground you!

shit.definition: To release excrement or solid waste.
examples: That bird just shit on me!
That movie was shit.

shit.definition: Expressing anger, contempt, frustration, or reluctance.

shut up.definition: A rude command for something, usually a person, animal, or AI, to be quiet or stop making noise.
examples: Shut up, you mutt! You're gonna wake up my mom!
If you don't shut up, I swear, I'm gonna slap you.

shut up.definition: To become quiet or stop talking.
examples: They shut up real quickly, let me tell ya.

skibidi.definition: Describes a person who is unpleasant, annoying, weird, or cringeworthy, or who doesn't conform to societal norms.
examples: Don't talk to that guy, he's so skibidi.

skibidi.definition: Describes something, often an event, that is wild, random, unexpected, odd, or otherwise surprising.
examples: That's so skibidi.
Those moves were so skibidi! How'd you even do that?!

slur.definition: A vulgar and highly offensive word that is used to discriminate against protected groups.
examples: They kept shouting racial slurs at me.

strength.definition: The ability to perform physically demanding tasks or withstand large amounts of force or pressure.
examples: His strength allowed him to move the 149 kilo weights with ease.
He had good mental strength, so he didn't crack easily.
The Wi-Fi is stronger in the kitchen.
I'm not into strong men. I'm more into weebs and femboys.

suck.definition: To use suction to pull an object towards a specific area.
examples: I got sucked into TikTok after just 1 second after scrolling - that's gotta be a world record!
The vacuum sucked the poor Lego brick into its bag.
You suck!
That restaurant sucked. I'm never going there again.
This movie sucks, can we watch something else?

sugar.definition: A type of carbohydrate used in foods that has a sweet taste, often containing glucose.
examples: I was making cookies for our first date, and accidentally put salt instead of sugar. She ended it after the first bite.
Next, mix 27 grams of sugar into the dough.

supercalifragilisticexpialidocious.definition: A word that describes an event that is extremely shocking, random, weird, or otherwise unexpected; a wild or crazy occurrence.

sus.definition: Describes something, usually a person, who is or is acting suspicious.
examples: Red's kinda sus, though...
Yeah, he's kinda sus, though...
